name: Basic Comparisons
description: Fundamental power analysis for basic statistical tests (t-tests, ANOVA, proportions, correlation, chi-square)

tasks.question: A cardiologist has enrolled 104 participants in a study comparing symptom severity scores between patients on a new medication versus standard treatment for hypertension. If an expected difference of 0.5, what statistical power will a two-sided test achieve at significance level of 0.05?
tasks.reference_code:
library(MKpower)
power.welch.t.test(delta=0.5, sd1=1, sd2=1.5, power=0.80, sig.level=0.05)

tasks.question: A oncologist has enrolled 438 participants in a study comparing functional capacity measures between patients on an experimental therapy versus placebo for type 2 diabetes. If an expected difference of 0.3, what statistical power will a two-sided test achieve at significance level of 0.05?
